data.title: Bertha Mae Vickers Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Bertha Mae Vickers,      68, of Concord Florida, passed away at her home in Concord on August 18, 2021.  There will be a private family funeral service for Mrs. Vickers at Conco...
data.text:
Bertha Mae Vickers, 68, of Concord Florida, passed away at her home in Concord on August 18, 2021. There will be a private family funeral service for Mrs. Vickers at Concord Cemetery.

Mrs. Vickers was a life long resident of Gadsden County, Mrs. Vickers was married on Valentines Day to Mr. David Vickers, they recently celebrated their 41 year wedding anniversary. Mrs. Vickers enjoyed gardening and working in her green house but most of all she enjoyed spending time with her grandchildren.

She is survived by her husband, David L. Vickers, Sr., her son David L. Vickers, Jr., one daughter, Heather M. Gallagher and step-son Christopher D. Vickers all of Havana, Florida. Two sister’s Phyllis Strahan and Sandra Johnson. Two grandchildren Hannah M. Gallagher and Hollie M. Gallagher.

She is preceded in death by her parents Mr. Emmett and Sallie Green and brother Arthur

“ Buddy” Green.

Faith Funeral Home is in charge of the funeral arrangements (850.539.4300 or www.faithfunerahome.com)
